answers.answer: Hi Masonbob,you are correct.  It is important to ask for the help you need as necessary to control diabetes well.Read as much as you can as well, as the more you know about management, the more you can control things well.

question: Hi for all thoes people with hi a1c it is ok just make sure you take care of it if left untreated diabetes can lead to serious health problems I know I'm One of those people with hi a1c it was 11.6 but I got help and now taking care of it better but it can lead to heart disease and much more don't be afraid to ask questions to your parents they'll be a little upset but not ferious at you they will want to help you or ask your doctor's nurses and other people with diabetes because I know I was afraid to ask my mom or anybody but I get over the fear and my next doctors appointment is February 8 because with high A-1 C you'll get in little trouble with your doctor but mostly your mom or dad will get mostly in trouble because it's their kid and why are they not looking after them just don't be afraid to ask questions
title: Don't be afraid to ask questions
